PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-12982018-10-22,  ECCC,  ,  , 
ActHeritage Railway Stations Protection Act
SubjectVia Rail Canada - Alterations to its railway station in Halifax, Nova Scotia
PrecisOrder authorizing VIA RAIL CANADA to make ALTERATIONS to the main entrance and platform egress doors, as well as to the floor and walls in the main concourse area, at its railway station in Halifax, Nova Scotia, in accordance with the terms and conditions set out.
AttachmentsAttachment
